metadata.scenario: Customer support interaction about a billing issue

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm seeing a charge on my account for $79.99 that I don't recognize. My account number is 1234567890. I'm pretty sure I cancelled my subscription last month, so I'm really confused.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I've located your account. I see a charge of $79.99 for our Premium Plus service. Let me investigate the cancellation date for you.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thank you. I really thought I cancelled it though. If I did cancel, why am I still getting charged? And if I didn't cancel, when *does* my current subscription end? I need to be sure I stop this from happening again.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I've checked your account, and I see that your cancellation request was initiated on [Date] but it looks like the final step wasn't completed. I have now fully cancelled your subscription, and you will not be charged again. As for the current charge of $79.99, I have issued a refund to your original payment method. Please allow 7-10 business days for it to appear. Your subscription was supposed to end on [Date]. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
